title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons in the dialog box are too small. b. When the dialog box appears, no table entry is automatically selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog box appears too large for methods with many parameters.
